languages.text: Джай Хейдари многие годы продолжала согреваться в лучах славы Вольного Торговца, стараясь взять все, что ей предоставляло столь высокое покровительство. Увы, аппетиты ее не знали меры, и, спустя два десятилетия, она осмелилась на дерзкую попытку дворцового переворота. Потерпев неудачу, она оказалась на плахе и рассталась с жизнью, подарив на прощание толпе черни свою знаменитую улыбку.

Jae Heydari basked in the Rogue Trader's light for many years, trying to make the most of such illustrious patronage. Alas, her appetites were insatiable, and two decades later, she brazenly attempted a coup. It was a failure, and she found herself on the executioner's block. Before the end, she bestowed one of her famous smiles on the thronging rabble in farewell.
languages.original_text: Джай Хейдари многие годы продолжала согреваться в лучах славы Вольного Торговца, стараясь взять все, что ей предоставляло столь высокое покровительство. Увы, аппетиты ее не знали меры, и, спустя два десятилетия, она осмелилась на дерзкую попытку дворцового переворота. Потерпев неудачу, она оказалась на плахе и рассталась с жизнью, подарив на прощание толпе черни свою знаменитую улыбку.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari basked in the fame of the Rogue Trader for many years, trying to make the most of such a high level of patronage. Lamentably, her appetite was insatiable. Two decades later she brazenly dared to attempt a coup. The attempt was not successful, and she found herself on a scaffold, losing her life. In the end, she gave her one last famous smile to the thronging rabble.

Jae Heydari basked in the fame of the Rogue Trader for many years, trying to make the most of such a high level of patronage. Lamentably, her appetite was insatiable. Two decades later she brazenly dared to attempt a coup. The attempt was not successful, and she found herself on a scaffold, losing her life. In the end, she gave her one last famous smile to the thronging rabble.

Jae Heydari basked in the fame of the Rogue Trader for many years, trying to make the most of such a high level of patronage. Alas, her appetites were insatiable. Two decades later, she brazenly attempted a coup. It was a failure, and she found herself on the executioner's block. She gave one last famous smile to the thronging rabble before the end.

Jae Heydari basked in the fame of the Rogue Trader for many years, trying to make the most of such a high level of patronage. Alas, her appetites were insatiable. Two decades later, she brazenly attempted a coup. It was a failure, and she found herself on the executioner's block. She gave one last famous smile to the thronging rabble before the end.

Jae Heydari basked in the Rogue Trader's light for many years, trying to make the most of such illustrious patronage. Alas, her appetites were insatiable, and two decades later, she brazenly attempted a coup. It was a failure, and she found herself on the executioner's block. Before the end, she bestowed one of her famous smiles on the thronging rabble in farewell.

Jae Heydari basked in the Rogue Trader's light for many years, trying to make the most of such illustrious patronage. Alas, her appetites were insatiable, and two decades later, she brazenly attempted a coup. It was a failure, and she found herself on the executioner's block. Before the end, she bestowed one of her famous smiles on the thronging rabble in farewell.

languages.text: 多年以来，婕伊·海达利一直得到行商浪人的青睐，充分利用行商浪人慷慨的赞助。但遗憾的是，她贪心不足。二十年之后，她悍然发动政变，最终以失败收场，被送上了断头台。在死亡到来前，她对人群最后一次露出了她那标志性的微笑，作为告别。
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari basked in the Rogue Trader's light for many years, trying to make the most of such illustrious patronage. Alas, her appetites were insatiable, and two decades later, she brazenly attempted a coup. It was a failure, and she found herself on the executioner's block. Before the end, she bestowed one of her famous smiles on the thronging rabble in farewell.

traits.locale_text: 多年以来，婕伊·海达利一直沉浸在行商浪人的盛名之中，试图充分利用行商浪人慷慨的的赞助。但遗憾的是，她贪心不足。二十年之后，她悍然发动政变，最终以失败收场，被送上了断头台。在死亡到来前，她对人群最后一次露出了她那标志性的微笑。

languages.text: Jae Heydari badete sich viele Jahre lang im Licht {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und versuchte, das Maximum aus dieser Beziehung in die obersten Ebenen der Macht herauszuholen. Doch ihr Appetit war unersättlich, und zwei Jahrzehnte später unternahm sie einen dreisten Putschversuch. Der Verrat scheiterte und sie wurde zum Tode verurteilt. Vor dem Ende schenkte sie dem Pulks des Pöbels zum Abschied noch einmal ihr berühmtes Lächeln.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari basked in the Rogue Trader's light for many years, trying to make the most of such illustrious patronage. Alas, her appetites were insatiable, and two decades later, she brazenly attempted a coup. It was a failure, and she found herself on the executioner's block. Before the end, she bestowed one of her famous smiles on the thronging rabble in farewell.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari badete sich viele Jahre lang im Ruhm {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und versuchte, das Maximum aus dieser Beziehung in die obersten Ebenen der Macht herauszuholen. Aber ihr Appetit war unersättlich. Zwei Jahrzehnte später unternahm sie einen dreisten Putschversuch. Der Verrat scheiterte und sie wurde zum Tode verurteilt. Vor ihrem Ableben grinste sie den schaulustigen Pöbel noch einmal an, was zu ihrer Legende nur noch beitrug.

languages.text: Jae Heydari tira parti de la renommée {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} durant de longues années, ne manquant aucune occasion de bénéficier des largesses de {mf|son|sa} mécène. Hélas, ses appétits étaient insatiables et deux décennies plus tard, elle organisa un soulèvement. Sa tentative se solda par un échec et elle se retrouva sur l'échafaud. Elle ne manqua pas d'adresser l'un de ses célèbres sourires à la foule rassemblée pour lui faire ses adieux.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari basked in the Rogue Trader's light for many years, trying to make the most of such illustrious patronage. Alas, her appetites were insatiable, and two decades later, she brazenly attempted a coup. It was a failure, and she found herself on the executioner's block. Before the end, she bestowed one of her famous smiles on the thronging rabble in farewell.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari tira parti de la renommée {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} durant de longues années, ne manquant aucune occasion de bénéficier des largesses de {mf|son|sa} mécène. Hélas, ses appétits étaient insatiables et deux décennies plus tard, elle organisa un soulèvement. Sa tentative se solda par un échec et elle se retrouva sur l'échafaud. Elle ne manqua pas d'adresser son plus beau sourire à la foule rassemblée pour assister à son exécution.

languages.text: Jae Heydari gozó del brillo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente durante muchos años, tratando de sacar todo el partido posible a tan excepcional patrocinio. Por desgracia, sus apetitos eran insaciables y, dos décadas más tarde, trató de hacerse con su puesto. Fracasó y acabó en el patíbulo. Antes de su final, llegó incluso a dedicar la última de sus famosas sonrisas a la muchedumbre vociferante como despedida.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari basked in the Rogue Trader's light for many years, trying to make the most of such illustrious patronage. Alas, her appetites were insatiable, and two decades later, she brazenly attempted a coup. It was a failure, and she found herself on the executioner's block. Before the end, she bestowed one of her famous smiles on the thronging rabble in farewell.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari disfrutó de la fama de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente durante muchos años, tratando de sacar todo el partido posible a tan excepcional patrocinio. Por desgracia, sus apetitos eran insaciables. Dos décadas más tarde, trató de organizar un golpe de Estado. Fracasó y acabó en el patíbulo. Antes de su final, llegó incluso a dedicar la última de sus famosas sonrisas a la muchedumbre vociferante.

languages.text: ジェイ・ヘイダリは、長年にわたって自由開拓者の栄光に浴し、その輝かしい庇護を最大限に利用しようとしていた。しかし、彼女の欲望はとどまるところを知らなかった。20年後、彼女は大胆にもクーデターを企てたのだ。それは失敗に終わり、彼女は処刑台に立たされた。彼女は最期、群がる暴徒に向かってその有名な微笑みを見せた。
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari basked in the Rogue Trader's light for many years, trying to make the most of such illustrious patronage. Alas, her appetites were insatiable, and two decades later, she brazenly attempted a coup. It was a failure, and she found herself on the executioner's block. Before the end, she bestowed one of her famous smiles on the thronging rabble in farewell.

traits.locale_text: ジェイ・ヘイダリは、長年にわたって自由開拓者の栄光に浴し、その輝かしい庇護を最大限に利用しようとしていた。しかし、彼女の欲望はとどまるところを知らなかった。20年後、彼女は大胆にもクーデターを企てたのだ。それは失敗に終わり、彼女は処刑台に立たされた。彼女は最期、群がる暴徒に向かってその有名な微笑みを見せた。

languages.text: Jae Heydari; birçok yıl boyunca Hür Tacir'in ışığının altında olmanın keyfini çıkardı, böylesine tanınmış bir hamisinin olmasının avantajlarından faydalandı. Ancak iştahı kabarıyordu ve yirmi yılın ardından arsızca bir darbe girişiminde bulundu. Girişim başarısızlıkla sonuçlanınca Jae, kendini idam sehpasında buldu. Ölmeden önce idamı için toplanan ayaktakımına veda maiyetinde o ünlü gülümsemelerinden birini bahşetti.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari basked in the Rogue Trader's light for many years, trying to make the most of such illustrious patronage. Alas, her appetites were insatiable, and two decades later, she brazenly attempted a coup. It was a failure, and she found herself on the executioner's block. Before the end, she bestowed one of her famous smiles on the thronging rabble in farewell.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari birçok yıl boyunca Hür Tacir'in ışığının altında olmanın keyfini çıkardı, böylesine tanınmış bir hamisinin olmasının avantajlarından faydalandı. Ancak iştahı kabarıyordu ve yirmi yılın ardından arsızca bir darbe girişiminde bulundu. Girişim başarısızlıkla sonuçlandı ve Jae kendini idam sehpasında buldu. Yaşamını yitirmeden önce, idamı için toplanmış ayaktakımına veda maiyetinde o ünlü gülümsemelerinden birini bahşetti.
